reviewtext: 54 year old audio engineer, video shooter/editor, former radio host. I used 7506s for my video shoots for many years. They are wonderful. These V6s are every bit as great. Light comfy, straight excellent sound. If you're gonna get a cramp because it doesnt have a red Pro sticker on the side, get 7506s. If you want equally great headphones at steal of a price buy the V6s here, you'll be very happy.Get these phones, and live happily ever after.
